hero.title: Primary Unit for Multiple Intelligences and Talents – Boys and Girls
hero.subtitle: Al-Tamakon Comprehensive School / Primary Unit for Multiple Intelligences and Talents – Boys and Girls

content.heading: Multiple Intelligences – Primary Stage
content.paragraphtwo: In this unit, the student studies within the regular education track (ordinary certificate), according to the age-appropriate (ministerial) standards of the Qatari national curriculum, with arrangements and accommodations provided in line with the student’s abilities and needs. The student also receives supportive services in the three core subjects (Arabic language, Mathematics, and English language) from qualified specialists.
